body.name: Earbuds Mini Wireless Earbuds Bluetooth Headphones 5.3 with LED Power Display Charging Case Ear Buds IPX7 Waterproof Earphones Light-Weight Earbud with Mic for Phone Laptop PC TV Running Workout Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 13 hrs 52 mins
features: Ultra-light & LED Digital Display: Earbuds (Zingbird T62) weigh merely 3.3g/pc, making them as light as a feather, ensuring a comfortable and concealed wearing. Bluetooth earbuds come with 3 pairs of soft ear tips in varying sizes (S, M, L), ideal for small, medium, and large ears. Earbuds wireless bluetooth's charging case features a power display with a transparent design, so wireless headphones bluetooth allowing you to know the remaining power in real-time without needing to open the case.

IPX7 Waterproof & Ultra-compact Design: Wireless earbuds are equipped with IPX7 water resistance, preventing damage from sweat and raindrops, thereby extending the earbuds' lifespan. These ear buds are perfect for running and leisure activities. Additionally, the wireless headphones' charging case is remarkably compact, only half the size of other earbud cases, saving significant space. Ear buds wireless bluetooth earbuds are easy to carry outdoors and can conveniently fit into your pocket.

Bass Acoustic and Touch Control: Bluetooth headphones are equipped with an advanced dynamic driver, delivering crystal-clear audio, especially in bass and treble aspects of music. Headphones wireless Bluetooth' bass acoustic design ensures powerful yet clear bass, while also delivering delicate and dynamic trebles. T62 tiny earphones feature intelligent touch controls, allowing easy volume adjustment, music switching, voice assistant activation, call handling, and low battery alerts.

Bluetooth 5.3 and One-Step Pairing: Bluetooth earbuds utilize Bluetooth 5.3 technology, ensuring stable connections for an immediate and seamless audio experience. Whether you're running at the gym or deeply engaged in gaming, the T62 small earbuds provide a smooth, lag-free performance. Upon initial pairing, simply remove the wireless ear buds from the charging case, select "T62" from your phone's Bluetooth settings menu, and both bluetooth earphones will instantly connect to your phone.

All-day Playback & Wide Applications: Each wireless earphone, equipped with a 30mAh capacity, offers up to 5 hours of playback. If you use one earbud at a time while keeping another earbud in the case, then both headphones can provide all-day playback. Let you travel worry-free, just bring an included USB-C cable to charge the case, and you can enjoy it anytime, anywhere. Earphones wireless bluetooth are suitable for various scenarios, including fitness, exercise, work, leisure, and cycling.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: T62 Mini Earbuds, Ultra Lightweight Easy to Carry35Hrs Music TimeClear CallIPX7 WaterproofPower DisplayComfortable to Wear

Support Dual Ear Touch Control Music: Play/Pause: Single Tap Left or Right Earbud Previous/Next Song: Double Tap L or R Earbud Decrease/Increase Volume: Long Press L/R Earbud Earbuds have a minimum & maximum volume tone to alert the ear buds volume to prevent accidental voice loss or to protect the ear from injury. Call: Answer/End/: Double Tap L or R Earbud Reject Call: Long Press L/R Earbud 1. During the call, use two earphones at the same time so that the other party can hear the call clearly. 2. When using headphones to answer the phone, if there is no sound in the earbuds, it may be that the default answering device is the phone speaker, not the earbuds device, you can manually click to switch to the earbuds call. Voice Assistance: Quick Triple Tap Left/Right Earbud Please refer to the QA video for details. (Search "play/pause, previouse/next song, decrease/increase volume, answer/end/reject call, voice assistance")

Long Battery Time, USB-C Compatible, Power Display Bluetooth earbuds with a 300mAh charging case, support type c charging, earbuds can be used for about 5 hours on a single charge and be used for total 35 hours charge in turn. T62 ear buds case features a clear power display, allowing you to know the remaining power of the case at any times.

Fast Connect, Compatible with All Bluetooth Enabled Devices As long as your device has Bluetooth, the wireless headphones will be compatible with it. After the first pairing, the headphones wireless bluetooth connects to the device very quickly, you just need to take the earbuds out of the case, turn on the Bluetooth of the phone, and it will be connected quickly. (PS: If you've already connected one device and need to connect to another, you'll need to unpair the previous device and the ear buds wireless bluetooth earbuds will be able to connect to your other device.) Please refer to the QA video for details. (Search "how to pair it")

Troubleshooting Guide 1. Can't be charged / Digital display won't light up The charging contact points of the earbuds or case may be dirty. *You can clean them with a cleaning stick dipped in a small amount of alcohol.* Incorrect charging cable used. * Use the included cable to charge the set. * 2. Poor sound quality or easy to drop The ear tips don't fit well enough. * Try other included ear tips for the best fitting. (S M L size) * The grilles or the ear tips may dirty. * Clean them with a cleaning stick. * Other issues, please refer to the T62 troubleshooting guide on the page of T62 product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, lightweight, comfortable and great sound.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The case is really good looking, light weight and compact. Inside the box there are 3 pairs of silicone eartips (one installed in the earbuds, and the others are in the accessories box) of different sizes (S, M and L). The paring process in Android phones is really easy. The audio quality is really good for the price as the highs and mids are clear, crisp and detailed, but in my opinion it lacks a bit of bass, but this is only my personal taste. However, I am really surprised of the sound quality overall and I could use them everyday without a doubt. The construction material (plastic) does not feel cheap at all and they look premium devices. The earbuds are really lightweight and comfortable but passive noise cancellation (it does not feature ANC) is just ok. The charging case has a transparent lid with a LED charging indicator and battery duration is great for me as I don’t usually wear earbuds for so long (only when I am working out, walking, commuting, or relaxing). To sum up, I really like the sound quality and I enjoy it so much that I could easily ignore the lack of bass. The weight and design make it very comfortable. A great purchase for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful economy in-ear buds
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I've been pleasantly surprised with the build quality and overall functionality of this new Zingbird brand. Their products are priced very competitively and offer exceptional sound as well as extremely comfortable fit when wearing. I work from home and use in-ear earbuds all the time as they are more comfortable than using an actual headset.This T62 model delivers exceptionally good sound and has a great microphone that dampens background noise easily. I love how they are truly in-ear and so light and well fitting I sometimes forget I'm wearing them. They're easy controlled with the touch pads on top of each earbud and super simple to pair via Bluetooth to any device you may want to connect them with.If you're looking for a great, solid set of in-ear earbuds for everyday use or a less expensive pair to take with you to the gym or out running, you can't go wrong with the Zingbird T62. The pill shaped case fits easily into the smallest of pockets or handbags and the rapid charging USB C cable lets you power them up within an hour or so. In active use they easily last me through the day and I can get usually a couple of days active usage on them on a single charge.If you want a solid, economically priced pair of in-ear earbuds, you can't go wrong here. My only complaint would be that I would love a small loop point where I could fit a wrist loop or lanyard for those of us who like much larger bags as it can sometimes be tricky to find at the bottom. Otherwise I'm continually checking for new Zingbird products as they've become a favorite of mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall Pretty Good Product
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. For the good points;They're definitely a good little pair of Bluetooth ear buds. For the price, it's a great deal! Plus you get a lifetime guarantee, so you really can't lose. Easy to read and follow instructions. They're sleek and compact. I wore them under my helmet while riding my motorcycle and I had no problem with them pushing against the inside of my helmet while in my ears. The battery life is really good, as well. I made a phone call and I could hear the person really well and they could hear me very clearly.For the not so good points; Unfortunately not tremendously loud. A bit disappointing on that. I played a couple of songs, while the sound was crisp and clear, the definitely lacked a bit on the bass lows. However, those were the only things I found these ears lacked.Overall;They pack a lot into a $30-$35 pair of Bluetooth ear buds. Good price, good quality, decent sound, good battery life, easy to use and compact.These would be great for: someone who's working out at the gym or home, while at work to block out some of that coworker chatter, while cleaning the house, someone who needs to make a lot of hands-free phone calls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price, these are great quality
reviews.reviewText: I opened them and they were already charged and ready to go. I used them for the gym and had zero issues with them. The sound quality was good and the touch functionality is great and easy to use. I’d definitely recommend these if you’re not wanting to spend a lot of money on earbuds,they are exactly what you pay: a pair of solid, budget-friendly earbuds. The sound quality is decentThese are both cute and functional. If you have small ears like me, you’ll definitely need the smallest tips, and even then I experience mild soreness after wearing these for extended periods, They’re super cute and the touch controls are useful and intuitive. However, there is no volume control on the earbud which I feel is tough if you’re using these to exercise or during periods when your phone is out of reach. There isn’t much bass, but that’s common in earbuds. If you’re looking for bass, I’d recommend over-ear headphones instead. For what I paid, I’m pleased with what I got These have a better case and much better touch controls, though. The fit is good, The batteries in this thing are amazing - They will play a long time without needing to recharge. Bluetooth connectivity is simple and works great-I never have any problems connecting to my devices. These are great work and outdoor activities. Would recommend these for sure.
